metadata.title: "We Shouldn’t Have Played the Old Camp Game Again" Creepypasta
metadata.description:
CREEPYPASTA STORY►by goose.jpg: https://www.patreon.com/c/goosejpg/posts
Creepypastas are the campfire tales of the internet. Horror stories spread through Reddit r/nosleep, forums and blogs, rather than word of mouth. Whether you believe these scary stories to be true or not is left to your own discretion and imagination. 

LISTEN TO CREEPYPASTAS ON THE GO-
SPOTIFY► https://open.spotify.com/show/7l0iRPdyi5UcHtDVWStxl4
iTUNES► https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/creepsmcpasta-creepypasta-radio/id1492008134

videos.title: 7 CHILLING Horror Stories to listen to while you melt in the Summer heat (help me)

metadata.title: 7 CHILLING Horror Stories to listen to while you melt in the Summer heat (help me)
metadata.description:
CREEPYPASTA STORIES-
►0:00 "Every evening, our family calmly locks Grandpa in his bedroom" Creepypasta
►30:35 "When our town loses power, we light candles. Not for ourselves, but for them" Creepypasta
►1:00:33 "I Was Hired to Demolish an Asylum. I Didn’t Know They Left One Room Sealed." Creepypasta
►1:31:43 "I Work at a Storage Facility. Unit 103’s Lease Has Never Expired" Creepypasta
►2:00:32 "I’m a Dentist. I Know What’s Inside Your Teeth, And It’s Not Decay" Creepypasta
►2:28:18 "I Work for the County Removing Old Hiking Trail Signs. I Should Have Listened to the Locals." Creepypasta
►2:50:48 "There’s an Elevator Shaft in the Middle of the Field. It Only Goes Down." Creepypasta
Creepypastas are the campfire tales of the internet. Horror stories spread through Reddit r/nosleep, forums and blogs, rather than word of mouth. Whether you believe these scary stories to be true or not is left to your own discretion and imagination. 

LISTEN TO CREEPYPASTAS ON THE GO-

videos.title: I Worked as a Park Ranger in Western Alaska… What I Saw Still Haunts Me | CREEPYPASTA

metadata.title: I Worked as a Park Ranger in Western Alaska… What I Saw Still Haunts Me | CREEPYPASTA
metadata.description:
In tonight’s chilling tale, a former park ranger recounts a harrowing expedition deep into the Alaskan wilderness, where whispers of missing families, strange worshippers, and something monstrous lurking beneath the ice lead him into a nightmare far darker than he ever imagined.

Today’s fabulous offering is ' I Worked as a Park Ranger in Western Alaska… What I Saw Still Haunts Me’, an original story by Augustus Cordoba, kindly shared directly with me via email for the express purpose of having me exclusively narrate it here for you all.

Real human voice horror narrations, no AI voice ever!

Background music by me (freely available for use by other Creepypasta / No Sleep narrators):

https://soundcloud.com/dr-creepen

https://soundcloud.com/dr-creepen-vol-2

Other music used is credited to the wonderful The Dark Somnium (intro) and the fantastic Tanner Stokes (end credits). The music is used here with their express permission.

Video footage was either made by me with whatever Go Pro

videos.title: I Stole a Laptop that Can Access the Vatican’s Secret Library | A REMASTERED CREEPYPASTA CLASSIC

metadata.title: I Stole a Laptop that Can Access the Vatican’s Secret Library | A REMASTERED CREEPYPASTA CLASSIC
metadata.description:
Our story “The Vatican’s Hidden History: A Stolen Archive” follows a historian who risks everything to uncover what the Church keeps locked away. Inside the shadowed halls of the Holy See, whispers of forbidden knowledge and unspeakable rituals begin to surface… and the deeper he digs, the more he realizes some secrets were never meant to be unearthed.

Today’s tale of the weird and macabre is ‘The laptop I stole from a Catholic priest has access to the Vatican’s secret library’, an original work by The Vatican Archivist, narrated here for you all with the author’s express permission: 

https://www.reddit.com/user/TheVaticanArchivist/ 

Real human voice horror narrations, no AI voice ever!

Background music by me (freely available for use by other Creepypasta / No Sleep narrators):

https://soundcloud.com/dr-creepen

https://soundcloud.com/dr-creepen-vol-2

Other music used is credited to the wonderful The Dark Somnium (intro) and the fantastic Tanner Stokes (end credits). The music is

videos.title: The Lucid Dream Experiment | SLEEP EXPERIMENT HORROR [Project W.I.L.D]

metadata.title: The Lucid Dream Experiment | SLEEP EXPERIMENT HORROR [Project W.I.L.D]
metadata.description:
In the silence of sleep paralysis, something ancient and patient leans close enough to breathe.

Use the promo code SUPERBAD for 10% off your T-shirt! 

https://dr-creepens-vault.creator-spring.com/listing/the-devil-is-in-the-detail

Project WILD begins as a search for control, a way to tame nightmares through lucid dreaming. But once the experiment starts, something else slips through the cracks. As our narrator drifts between waking and dreaming, a shadowed presence lingers at the edges of his vision, waiting. The deeper he ventures, the more fragile the line between dream and reality becomes… until the question is no longer whether he’s in control, but whether he’ll ever wake up at all.

Tonight’s fabulous story is 'Project W.I.L.D' by Tin 77, kindly shared with me via the Creepypasta Wiki and read to you here under the conditions of the CC-BY-SA license:

https://creepypasta.fandom.com/wiki/Project_WILD

https://creepypasta.fandom.com/wiki/User:Tin77

Real human voice horror narrat

metadata.title: "Judas" S9E06 Drew Blood’s Dark Tales (Scary Stories Podcast)
metadata.description:
TODAY'S EPISODE OF DREW BLOOD'S DARK TALES IS PROUDLY SPONSORED BY: Factor! Get 50% off plus free shipping on your first box at https://www.factormeals.com/drew50off

On this week’s Drew Blood’s Dark Tales, step beyond the veil of the ordinary and into a world where secrets fester in the dark, and what waits in the shadows may not be what it seems. From author J.G. Martin comes a chilling blend of cosmic dread and human fragility—a tale that asks what price we pay when monsters aren’t the ones we should fear. Settle in, friend… tonight’s story may just change the way you look at good, evil, and everything in between.

metadata.title: "Kith and Kin" S13E10 💀 Horror Hill (Scary Stories Creepypasta Podcast)
metadata.description:
TODAY'S EPISODE OF HORROR HILL IS PROUDLY SPONSORED BY: Factor! Get 50% off plus free shipping on your first box at https://www.factormeals.com/horror50off

In this chilling installment of Horror Hill, host Erik Peabody invites you into two tales bound by blood, legacy, and the dark things that thrive where family ties should comfort. From childhood fears that refuse to stay imaginary, to kinships forged in places no sane soul would dare tread, these stories unravel the horrors that live closest to home.

videos.title: "Claws for Concern" Ep 396 💀 Chilling Tales for Dark Nights Podcast (Horror Fiction)

metadata.title: "Claws for Concern" Ep 396 💀 Chilling Tales for Dark Nights Podcast (Horror Fiction)
metadata.description:
This week, Chilling Tales for Dark Nights invites you to a seaside town where neon lights flicker, carnival games ring out, and the scent of salt and fryer grease hangs in the air. But behind the laughter and music, the tide is carrying in something far less welcoming. Join host Steve Taylor and a full cast of voices—Geoff Sturtevant, Otis Jiry, Christopher Drape, Nick Goroff, Kevin Barbare, Olivia Steele, Katie Otten, and more—for a tale that begins with nostalgia and ends with nightmare. When the claws start clicking, the question isn’t what’s for dinner… but who.

▬ LISTEN TO THIS EPISODE AD-FREE IN OUR PATRONS AREA ▬
🗝️ https://www.chillingtalesfordarknights.com/patrons-area/chilling-tales-for-dark-nights-the-podcast/s1e396-claws-for-concern/

TURN OFF THE LIGHTS, AND TURN ON THE DARK.  

⏮️ PREVIOUS EPISODE "Vanishing Act" CTFDN Episode # 394:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7iRljuwKnbk

⚠️ Skip the intro: 3:39

videos.title: 21 Scary Stories to Fall Asleep To | 3 Hours with Rain Ambience

metadata.title: 21 Scary Stories to Fall Asleep To | 3 Hours with Rain Ambience
metadata.description:
Drift off into darkness with hours of true creepy stories that will send chills down your spine—just enough to lull you into sleep. These real-life horror stories feature unsettling encounters, paranormal activity, late-night stalkers, and disturbing mysteries told in a calm, immersive voice designed for late-night listening. Whether you're winding down or love sleeping to eerie ambience, this collection is perfect for fans of true scary stories, creepypasta, and sleep horror podcasts.

🕯️ New stories added weekly
🎧 Best with headphones
🌙 Ideal for night owls, insomniacs, and horror lovers


Check out the PODCAST! ►
Spotify -- https://spoti.fi/2o7wgnc
Apple Podcasts -- https://apple.co/2Mwumv6

OR WHEREVER YOU LISTEN TO PODCASTS

videos.title: 5 True Scary Motel Stories That Still Haunt Me

metadata.title: 5 True Scary Motel Stories That Still Haunt Me
metadata.description:
Check into these terrifying motel tales that will keep you up at night. In 5 True Scary Motel Stories That Still Haunt Me, I share real experiences of travelers who encountered danger, mystery, and pure horror behind cheap doors and flickering neon signs. From eerie late-night knocks to unsettling strangers lurking in the dark, these true scary stories prove that sometimes the scariest part of a road trip isn’t the journey—it’s the motel you stop at. Perfect for fans of creepy travel stories, true horror, and chilling real-life encounters...




On The Let's Read Podcast, you'll never stop discovering the creepiest True Scary Stories, Terrifying Internet Mysteries, Disturbing True Crime Cases, and Bizarre Paranormal Encounters — all read in full with immersive HUMAN narration and ambient horror. Whether you're into Real-Life Horror Stories from Reddit, True Crime Deep Dives about missing persons, or Creepypasta and Internet Lore that’ll keep you up at night, this channel covers it all.

videos.title: Moving Into a Nightmare | 5 True Scary New House Stories

metadata.title: Moving Into a Nightmare | 5 True Scary New House Stories
metadata.description:
Buying a new house should be exciting, but for these unlucky people, moving in turned into a nightmare. From unsettling neighbors to terrifying encounters inside the walls, these are 5 true scary new house stories that prove a dream home can quickly become a horror story...




On The Let's Read Podcast, you'll never stop discovering the creepiest True Scary Stories, Terrifying Internet Mysteries, Disturbing True Crime Cases, and Bizarre Paranormal Encounters — all read in full with immersive HUMAN narration and ambient horror. Whether you're into Real-Life Horror Stories from Reddit, True Crime Deep Dives about missing persons, or Creepypasta and Internet Lore that’ll keep you up at night, this channel covers it all.

We feature stories about Haunted Forests, Creepy Strangers, Unexplained Disappearances, Cults, Stalkers, and Cryptids like Skinwalkers and Wendigos. Popular themes include Scary Night Shift Stories, Disturbing Childhood Experiences, True Scary Camping Stories, Scary Back

videos.title: True Scary Stories Told to the Sound of Rain | Relax and Fall Asleep Quickly Vol. 385 l Black Screen

metadata.title: True Scary Stories Told to the Sound of Rain | Relax and Fall Asleep Quickly Vol. 385 l Black Screen
metadata.description: Slip into an eerie and captivating sleep with this collection of scary horror stories, perfectly paired with soothing rain sounds. Each story is chosen to send shivers down your spine, while the gentle rain creates a calming ambiance to help you relax. Whether you enjoy suspenseful thrillers or unsettling encounters, these tales will spark your imagination and enhance the spooky atmosphere. Let the peaceful rain envelop you, turning your surroundings into a mix of comfort and suspense. The blend of creepy stories and soothing rain offers a unique way to unwind before sleep, perfect for those who like a touch of fright with their relaxation routine. Ideal for nighttime listening, this video combines fear and relaxation, keeping you on the edge of your seat while finding comfort in the gentle rain sounds. Let the suspenseful tales and tranquil rain lead you into a restful slumber, with dreams as thrilling as the stories you hear.
